lead.en: GROW brings a true farm-to-table dining concept to the vibrant Seminyak/Petitenget lifestyle district.

paragraph.en:
The menu at GROW evolves with Bali’s ever-changing seasons and is largely driven by the availability of fresh produce

Using vegetables grown in the highlands of Kintamani and seafood sourced from the island’s coastal waters, GROW is all about maintaining the lowest possible carbon footprint.

text.en: Prices are quoted in ‘000 Rupiah, and subject to 10% Government Tax and 10% Service Charge
